name: Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico, S.A.B. de C.V.
description: Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico, S.A.B. de C.V. (PAC) is a leading airport operator in Mexico, managing 12 international airports in the Pacific region. Founded in 1998, the company is committed to providing high-quality services and infrastructure to support the growth of air travel in Mexico. With a focus on operational excellence, safety, and customer satisfaction, CAAP has developed a strong reputation in the aviation sector. The airports operated by CAAP include major hubs such as the Guadalajara International Airport, one of the busiest in the country, and the Tijuana International Airport, which serves as a gateway to the United States. The company is engaged in various expansion projects aimed at increasing capacity and improving services, including the modernization of terminals and the enhancement of passenger amenities. CAAP is also dedicated to sustainability and has implemented several initiatives to reduce its environmental impact, such as energy-efficient practices and waste management programs. As a publicly traded company, CAAP seeks to enhance shareholder value while contributing to the economic development of the regions it serves through improved connectivity and tourism promotion.

seo.meta_title: Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico | Leading Airport Operator in Mexico
seo.meta_description: Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico is a top airport operator in Mexico, managing 12 international airports with a commitment to quality, safety, and sustainability.

faq.question: What airports does Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico manage?
faq.answer: Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico manages 12 international airports in Mexico, including Guadalajara and Tijuana.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico?
faq.answer: Raúl Revuelta Musalem is the CEO of Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico.

faq.question: Where is Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico headquartered?
faq.answer: Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico is headquartered in Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico.

faq.question: What services does Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico provide?
faq.answer: The company provides passenger and cargo services, retail concessions, and airport management services.

faq.question: When was Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico founded?
faq.answer: Grupo Aeroportuario del Pacífico was founded in 1998.
